short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the latest news and breaking news today for U.S., world, weather, entertainment, politics and health at CNN.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The main feature of this Chrome Extension is to follow CNN U.S. news portal and send you notification as soon as CNN publishes news you are interested in.
Add CNN U.S. News Notifier to your Chrome and never miss:
-	Latest US news
-	Top stories 
-	Photos and videos 

All news from around the nation in your Browser. Get the day's top headlines delivered to you.

Follow and never miss the latest news and breaking news today for U.S., world, weather, entertainment, politics and health at CNN.com

Politics at CNN has news, opinion and analysis of American and global politics Find news and video about elections, the White House, the U.N and much more.
